00053 [scriptable, uuid(1c1c9f2a-75c0-4741-aac1-3254b08287ae)]
00054 interface sbIMediaItem : sbILibraryResource
00055 {
00059   readonly attribute sbILibrary library;
00060 
00061   /*
00062    * \brief The library that this media item is linked from.  This is to aid
00063    * in support of foreign media items
00064   readonly attribute sbILibrary originLibrary;
00065    */
00066 
00070   readonly attribute boolean isMutable;
00071 
00072 
00073 // Convenience Attributes (these should thunk directly to the sbILibraryResource::G/SetProperty calls)
00074 
00082   /*
00083   Prop: mediaCreated
00084 
00085   A timestamp representing the date and time at which this <MediaItem> was created.
00086 
00087   Type:
00088     Number
00089   */
00090   attribute long long mediaCreated;
00091 
00099   /*
00100   Prop: mediaUpdated
00101 
00102   A timestamp representing the date and time at which this <MediaItem> was last updated.
00103 
00104   Type:
00105     Number
00106   */
00107   attribute long long mediaUpdated;
00108 
00113   /*
00114   Prop: contentSrc
00115 
00116   The URI representing the location of the <MediaItem>.
00117 
00118   Type:
00119     Number, in bytes.
00120   */
00121   attribute nsIURI contentSrc;
00122 
00127   /*
00128   Prop: contentLength
00129 
00130   The size (in bytes) of the content of the <MediaItem>. If this <MediaItem>
00131   is also a <MediaList>, the contentLength will always be 0. 
00132 
00133   The contentLength may not be available for streams
00134 
00135   Type:
00136     Number, in bytes.
00137   */
00138   attribute long long contentLength;
00139 
00145   /*
00146   Prop: contentType
00147 
00148   The content type, also called mime type, of the <MediaItem>.
00149 
00150   Type:
00151     String
00152 
00153   Note:
00154     This property is never filled currently.
00155   */
00156   attribute AString contentType;
00157 
00158

00160 
00165   void testIsAvailable(in nsIObserver aObserver);
00166 
00176   nsIChannel openInputStreamAsync(in nsIStreamListener aListener, in nsISupports aContext);
00177 
00182   nsIInputStream openInputStream();
00183 
00188   nsIOutputStream openOutputStream();
00189 
00194   AString toString();
